text: Teréz Bednarik (born 20 July 1957) is a Hungarian rower. She competed in the women's coxless pair event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian female rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Hungary Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:People from Pest County
title: Teréz Bednarik
